title: A crash when an exception is caught in a caller and the receiver returned from `ensure`
vulnerability_information:
This snippet crashes when ran by `./bin/sandbox`:
```ruby
class A
  def foo
    pr = proc { return 1 }

    begin
      does_not_exist
    ensure
      pr[]
    end
  end
end

begin
  A.new.foo
rescue
end
```

Crash details:
```
./bin/sandbox:20: [BUG] Segmentation fault at 0x0000000000000e
ruby 2.3.1p112 (2016-04-26 revision 54768) [x86_64-linux]

c:0002 p:0201 s:0005 E:0015d8 EVAL   ./bin/sandbox:20 [FINISH]
c:0001 p:0000 s:0002 E:0017a0 (none) [FINISH]

  R8: 0x00007efdc0f7ecf5  R9: 0x0000000000000000 R10: 0x00007efdbfadb0d0
 R11: 0x0000000000000006 R12: 0x0000000000000010 R13: 0x0000000000000091
 R14: 0x00007efdbfa811d0 R15: 0x00007efdbfa810b0 EFL: 0x0000000000010246

-- C level backtrace information -------------------------------------------

/usr/lib/libpthread.so.0 [0x7efdc4c4f080]
mruby-engine/lib/mruby_engine/mruby_engine.so(mrb_respond_to+0x14) [0x7efdc0f073b4] mruby-engine/ext/mruby_engine/mruby/include/mruby/boxing_word.h:75
```

My environment is as follows:
* mruby-engine version is 09be20e67888b20bebf9b0588bc3cbec7f55325f
* MRuby version is d0ecf862d9d2e7aed461bc9360686449f56c5d25
* I have mruby-print added to my gem box
* GCC version is "gcc (GCC) 6.3.1 20170109"
* I'm running ArchLinux (uname -r => "4.8.13-1-ARCH")

    begin
      does_not_exist

end

begin
  A.new.foo
rescue
end

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!

activities.message: Thank you for your report. We have reproduced the crash and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3462
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your report. We have reproduced the crash and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3462

activities.message:
Thanks again for your report. This issue was resolved upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/b563bcb7ff87b859ccdfa30f5d7c3f06cb26a239

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks again for your report. This issue was resolved upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/b563bcb7ff87b859ccdfa30f5d7c3f06cb26a239

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.

activities.message: Glad to hear it, thanks for keeping me in the loop.
activities.markdown_message: Glad to hear it, thanks for keeping me in the loop.

activities.message: Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify Scripts and the MRuby project!
